item.title: Video Viewing and Critique - Upwork
item.description:
New YouTube channel with 25 videos and each video averages 12 minutes long. I need someone to watch all 25 videos, completely. Subscribe to my channel. Complete a half page summary of what they liked, did not, and what could be improved. I am looking for ten different people to complete this project. Note: You will be required to submit proof that you completely watched all 25 videos. It totals about 5 hours of total watch time.

Budget: $10
Posted On: June 27, 2024 23:03 UTC
Category: General Virtual Assistance

Skills: English

item.title: Life Events Video editing on Adobe Premiere - Upwork
item.description:
Hello,

I run a video production studio in Berkeley CA USA. We are producing a lot of corporate and private event videos. I need a few video editors using Adobe Premiere (only) to help us with the editing. I will send you a link to download all the footage (10 to 200 GB), well organized into folders, using Dropbox, and you will send me back the Premiere files only. You need to know the Adobe tools well, be well organized, creative, and cut fast. We are not talking here about highly creative production, it is mostly documenting events: classes, seminars, graduations, speeches, birthdays, weddings, parties, full documentaries and/or highlights.

Since 1998 I have completed more than 8000 projects, and I know very well how to estimate how long it takes to edit each project. I will let you know in advance how many hours to spend on each project as well as a due date. And due dates must be respected. Depending on your skills, I will progressively give you more interesting and creative projects.

Please no long introduction letters, just answer the questions below and links to samples of your work

Thanks

Hourly Range: $8.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 23:00 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop, Animation, Photo Slideshow, Testimonial Video, Education, Music Video, Video Commercial, Documentary, Movie, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Screencasting Video
Skills: Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Motion Graphics, Video Post-Editing, Audio Editing, Video Editing, Video Production, Adobe Photoshop, Animation, Photo Slideshow, Testimonial Video, Education, Music Video, Video Commercial, Documentary, Movie, Explainer Video, Video Intro & Outro, Adobe Premiere Pro, Screencasting Video
Country: United States

item.title: Interview video videography and editing - Upwork
item.description:
*Must be located in or willing to drive to Denver and/or Boulder, Colorado*

Film interviews with five different Furniture For Life customers in each customer’s respective home.
All interviews will take place in the Denver/Boulder metro area.
Interviewees have not been selected, so exact filming locations are not known.
Each interview will take 30-45 minutes, plus time for set up and tear down.
An off-screen interviewer will be provided by the client.

Deliverables:
-All raw footage
-Video 1: 10-15 minute “master video” consisting of snippets from all interview subjects
--The video will be divided into sections about 1) how their massage chairs have improved their lives, 2) what their shopping/selection experience was like with Furniture For Life, 3) what their post-purchase customer support experience was like, and 4) is their massage chair worth the cost.
--Snippets for each topic will be identified by client
-Video 2: 2 minute highlights video, drawing footage from the master video
-Video 3: Theme video A: 2-5 minute stand-alone video using same footage as section 1 of the master video. Should require minimal additional editing.
-Video 4: Theme video B:  2-5 minute stand-alone video using same footage as section 2 of the master video. Should require minimal additional editing.
-Video 5: Theme video C:  2-5 minute stand-alone video using same footage as section 3 of the master video. Should require minimal additional editing.
-Video 6: Theme video C:  2-5 minute stand-alone video using same footage as section 4 of the master video. Should require minimal additional editing.

This project is work-for-hire, and all footage is the property of the client.


Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:48 UTC
Category: Video Production
Skills:Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Skills: Testimonial Video, Video Editing, Video Production, Videography
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor for Adventure Travel YouTube Channel - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative video editor to join our team on an ongoing basis. As our partner, you will be responsible for editing raw adventure travel footage and turning it into engaging and fun YouTube videos. Your primary tasks will include reviewing and organizing footage, cutting and trimming clips, adding transitions and effects, and syncing audio. We are looking for someone with a keen eye for detail, a strong sense of storytelling, and proficiency in video editing software such as Adobe Premiere Pro or Final Cut Pro. It might be helpful but not necessary to have experience with Filmora 13 as that is the software we use to edit videos. Knowledge of color grading and motion graphics is a plus. If you are passionate about filmmaking and have a knack for creating visually stunning videos, we would love to hear from you.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$22.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:50 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Wondershare Filmora, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Skills: Wondershare Filmora, Adobe Premiere Pro, Video Editing, Video Post-Editing, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editor - Remove Watermark - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video editor who can remove watermarks from videos. The selected candidate will be responsible for editing videos to ensure a professional and polished final product. The main task will be to remove watermarks from the videos while maintaining the video's quality. This role requires attention to detail, creativity, and expertise in video editing software.

    Responsibilities:
    - Edit videos to remove watermarks
    - Enhance video quality and ensure smooth transitions
    - Add relevant effects and graphics as needed
    - Meet project deadlines

    Skills:
    - Proficient in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
    - Strong knowledge of video formats and codecs
    - Attention to detail and ability to maintain video quality
    - Creativity in enhancing videos

    This is a small-sized project with an expected duration of under 1 month. We are looking for an intermediate-level video editor to join our team and help us deliver high-quality videos without watermarks.

item.title: UGC viral hook script writing expert - Upwork
item.description:
**Job Description:**

We are seeking a talented and experienced UGC (User-Generated Content) Script Writer to join our team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for creating engaging and compelling scripts for a series of 15-20 second videos. These videos will be used across various social media platforms to promote our brand and connect with our audience.

**Responsibilities:**

- Write creative and engaging scripts for 15-20 second UGC videos.
- Develop content that resonates with our target audience and aligns with our brand voice.
- Collaborate with our marketing and creative teams to ensure the scripts meet campaign goals.
- Incorporate feedback and make revisions as necessary to achieve the best results.
- Stay up-to-date with social media trends and viral content to create relevant and timely scripts.

**Requirements:**

- Proven experience as a script writer, particularly in creating short-form content for social media.
- Strong understanding of UGC and its impact on audience engagement.
- Excellent writing, editing, and proofreading skills.
- Ability to convey ideas concisely and effectively within a short timeframe.
- Familiarity with various social media platforms and their content guidelines.
- Creative thinker with a keen eye for detail and a passion for storytelling.
- Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects simultaneously.

**Preferred Qualifications:**

- Experience working with brands or marketing agencies.
- Knowledge of SEO and keyword optimization for social media.
- Strong portfolio showcasing previous work in short-form video script writing.

**How to Apply:**

Please submit your resume, a cover letter, and a portfolio of your work (including examples of short-form video scripts) to [email address]. In your cover letter, explain why you are the perfect fit for this role and how your experience aligns with our needs.

We look forward to seeing your creative work!



Hourly Range: $25.00-$80.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:47 UTC
Category: Scriptwriting
Skills:Content Writing, Copywriting, Creative Writing, Writing, Marketing Strategy, Article Writing, English, Social Media Marketing
Skills: Content Writing, Copywriting, Creative Writing, Writing, Marketing Strategy, Article Writing, English, Social Media Marketing
Country: Australia
click to apply

item.title: Clipper Needed for Video Clip Collection of Sports & Celebrity Video Footage - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking to work with a talented Clipper in order to source video clips that we will use for our content series, 25 Most Famous Athletes. The videos we are producing are 1m15s spotlights of the most famous athletes in the world, such as Messi, Lebron James, Caitlin Clark, and more. The video content will cover not just their on-field highlights, but focus primarily on their off-the-field fame. The clips we need should represent this, and include footage of the athlete in scenarios that put their fame on display - such as photoshoots, sponsorship activations, commercials, interactions with large groups of fans, scenes where they have a lot of cameras in their face from paparazzi, mics from journalists, etc.

Each video will require approximately 20 clips of each athlete in a variety of situations. We've outlined specific scenes that we'd like for each person so that you have a template reference for each athlete.

Please find the example episode Run of Show here: https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1pg2PS3u6qzvDyAitHHgzbPH0Sco9FFMIiZTUIQNz8dU/edit?gid=0#gid=0

This position REQUIRES someone who is a sports fan for the role. Please do not apply if you do not follow sports. It's simply important so that the Clipper has the understanding of what scenes are best.

We will be producing other content down the line, so connecting with a talented Clipper here may lead to future work.

Budget: $400
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:46 UTC
Category: Data Entry
Skills:Data Entry, Clipper, Video Editing, Data Collection, Video Production
Skills: Data Entry, Clipper, Video Editing, Data Collection, Video Production
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Video Editing and Analysis with AI Tools - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented individual who is experienced in using AI tools for video editing and analysis. The main task will be to create a series of engaging videos from existing footage, incorporating animations, wording, and other visual effects. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in video editing and possess creative thinking skills to produce captivating content. The ability to leverage AI tools for video analysis will be crucial in identifying and enhancing key moments in the footage.

  Responsibilities:
  - Utilize AI tools to analyze video footage and identify relevant segments
  - Edit videos by adding animations, wording, and other visual effects
  - Ensure smooth transitions and seamless integration of various elements

  Skills Required:
  - Proficiency in video editing software (e.g., Adobe Premiere Pro, Final Cut Pro)
  - Familiarity with AI tools for video analysis
  - Creative thinking and attention to detail
  - Strong communication and collaborative skills

All source files are to be provided on completion of each stage and at final completion.

  This is a medium-sized project with an expected duration of 1 to 3 months. We are looking for an intermediate-level expert who can deliver high-quality videos that captivate our audience.

Hourly Range: $12.00-$36.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:45 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Video Editing, Python, Adobe Premiere Pro
Skills: Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence, Video Editing, Python, Adobe Premiere Pro

item.title: Video Editor for TikTok and Meta - Upwork
item.description:
As a Video Editor at Shownmedia, you will play a crucial role in shaping the visual impact of our direct-to-consumer ad campaigns on platforms like TikTok and Meta. This position involves working closely with our creative team to edit and assemble recorded footage into a finished project that matches the Creative Strategist’s vision and is suitable for advertising. The ideal candidate will have a strong understanding of editing software, a keen eye for detail, and the ability to effectively tell a story through video. You will be responsible for editing video content that is engaging, visually appealing, and on-brand, ensuring that it drives viewer engagement and meets the marketing objectives of our clients.

Duties:
- Edit video footage to create high-quality and engaging content
- Collaborate with the creative team to understand project requirements and objectives
- Trim footage segments and put together the sequence of the film
- Input music, dialogues, graphics, and effects
- Ensure logical sequencing and smooth running of the final product
- Continuously discover and implement new editing technologies and industry's best practices to maximize efficiency

Requirements:
- Able to work in Eastern Time Zone.
- Proven work experience as a Video Editor or similar role - Proficient in using film editing software such as Adobe Premiere, Adobe After Effects, and Adobe Creative Suite
- Strong understanding of post-production techniques including color grading, audio mixing, and typography
- Excellent attention to detail with a creative mind and storytelling skills
- Ability to work independently as well as collaborate effectively with a team.
- Strong time management skills to meet project deadlines If you are passionate about video editing and have the skills to bring stories to life through visual content, we would love to hear from you. Join our team of talented professionals and contribute to creating compelling videos that captivate audiences.

Job Type: Full-time

Hourly Range: $5.00-$12.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:26 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Social Media Video, Video Editing
Skills: Social Media Video, Video Editing
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: English Video Transcriptionist - Upwork
item.description:
We are looking for a skilled video transcriptionist to join our team remotely.  As a video transcriptionist, your main responsibility will be to transcribe educational video content accurately and efficiently. The ideal candidate should have excellent listening and typing skills, as well as a strong command of the English language. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the accuracy of the transcriptions. Additionally, familiarity with transcription software and the ability to meet deadlines is required.

You will be paid $60 per completed hour of transcriptions.

To apply you must take this online exam first: https://forms.gle/s48nCwmFHRJr8bTa9

    Responsibilities:
    - Transcribe video content accurately and efficiently
    - Ensure the accuracy of transcriptions by proofreading and editing
    - Meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work

    Skills:
    - Excellent listening and typing skills
    - Strong command of the English language
    - Attention to detail
    - Familiarity with transcription software

To apply you must take this online exam first: https://forms.gle/s48nCwmFHRJr8bTa9

Hourly Range: $60.00-$65.00

We are looking for a skilled video transcriptionist to join our team remotely.  As a video transcriptionist, your main responsibility will be to transcribe educational video content accurately and efficiently. The ideal candidate should have excellent listening and typing skills, as well as a strong command of the English language. Attention to detail is crucial to ensure the accuracy of the transcriptions. Additionally, familiarity with transcription software and the ability to meet deadlines is required.

You will be paid $60 per completed hour of transcriptions.

To apply you must take this online exam first: https://forms.gle/s48nCwmFHRJr8bTa9

    Responsibilities:
    - Transcribe video content accurately and efficiently
    - Ensure the accuracy of transcriptions by proofreading and editing
    - Meet deadlines and deliver high-quality work

    Skills:
    - Excellent listening and typing skills
    - Strong command of the English language
    - Attention to detail
    - Familiarity with transcription software

To apply you must take this online exam first: https://forms.gle/s48nCwmFHRJr8bTa9

Hourly Range: $60.00-$65.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:34 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Closed Captioning, Transcription Software, Video Transcription, Audio Transcription, Podcast Transcription
Skills: Closed Captioning, Transcription Software, Video Transcription, Audio Transcription, Podcast Transcription

item.title: Content Creation & Posting to Social Media - Upwork
item.description:
Are you passionate about podcasts and have a knack for production? We are seeking a detail-oriented and organized Podcast Production Assistant to join our team. If you love bringing creative projects to life and ensuring everything runs smoothly, this role is for you!

Responsibilities:

Stitch the intro to the main recording for each episode
Schedule and upload episodes to YouTube
Create promotional materials for social media
Maintain and update our podcast spreadsheet
Ensure all production tasks are organized and deadlines are met

Requirements:

Experience with podcast production
Proficiency with audio editing software (e.g., Audacity, Adobe Audition)
Familiarity with YouTube and social media platforms
Strong organizational and multitasking skills
Attention to detail and a proactive approach
Excellent communication skills

Preferred Qualifications:

Experience with video editing
Knowledge of SEO and online marketing strategies
Previous experience managing a content calendar

To Apply:
Please submit your resume, a brief cover letter outlining your relevant experience, and any examples of past podcast production work.

We look forward to hearing from you!

Hourly Range: $3.00-$10.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:20 UTC
Category: Content Strategy
Skills:Content Distribution & Promotion, Content Creation, Search Engine Optimization, Content Strategy, Content Management, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Instagram, Facebook
Skills: Content Distribution & Promotion, Content Creation, Search Engine Optimization, Content Strategy, Content Management, Social Media Content Creation, Social Media Management, Social Media Content, Instagram, Facebook
Country: United States

item.title: Social Media Content Creator - Upwork
item.description:
We are seeking a talented and creative Video Content Creator and Editor to join our tem. This role involves crafting compelling video content for our travel-focused platforms, including Instagram Reels and TikTok. The ideal candidate should be skilled in video production, editing, and storytelling, with a knack for creating engaging and trend-driven content. Experience in the travel niche is a plus.

Responsibilities
- Develop and produce high-quality video content for social media platforms. This includes conceptualizing, filming, and editing
- Research and identify trending video styles and topics within the travel niche
- Create captivating reels

Requirements
- Proven experience in video production and editing, with a strong portfolio showcasing your work
- Strong understanding of social media platforms and their video content requirements
- Creative mindset with a passion for storytelling and visual content
- Ability to work independently and meet deadlines
- Excellent communication and collaboration skills
- Experience in the travel industry is highly desirable

How to Apply
To apply, please submit your resume along with links to your previous work or pages you have worked with or helped. Applications without a portfolio will not be considered.

Hourly Range: $5.00-$15.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:17 UTC
Category: Social Media Marketing
Skills:Social Media Content, Instagram
Skills: Social Media Content, Instagram
Country: United States
click to apply

item.title: Strategic Short Form Tiktok Video Manager - Upwork
item.description:
About us:
Project 369 is a series of workbooks rooted in spirituality, neuroscience, and psychology. It contains profound wisdom, practices, and exercises that reprogram one's mind and allow one to manifest the reality one desires.

Responsibilities:

After selling around 500k copies, we're scaling our TikTok marketing efforts and we’re looking for someone with experience in managing our short-form tiktok editors as well as reposting accounts. Your job would involve reviewing short form edits and providing strategic feedback to our video editors, like how to create the best hooks, how to increase the chances of vitality, etc. You would also be responsible for managing our “Reposters” and making sure each editor has 1-2 reposters posting their videos. Here’s a summary of our expectations:

- Manage multiple short form video editors and respective reposting accounts
- Provide creative, strategic and actionable feedback on Short-form video content in line with brand, including HOOKS and other strategic edits to increase visibility
- Short-form Editor Management: Serve as the primary point of contact for Short Form Editors, managing ongoing communications, providing video feedback and ensuring they meet daily video edits in a timely manner
- Reposter Management: Serve as the primary point of contact for Reposting accounts, managing ongoing communications and ensuring reposters meet their contractual obligations.
- Bookkeeping: Maintain a detailed and organized record of Editors and Reposter accounts, tracking reposter accounts to ensure deadlines/reposts and analyzing the effectiveness of each partnership.
- Experience with Monday.com for organization of teams and videos




Hourly Range: $11.00-$44.00
Posted On: June 27, 2024 22:14 UTC
Category: Brand Strategy
Skills:Advertising Strategy, Storytelling, Social Media Management, Brand Research, Video Editing, Marketing Strategy
Skills: Advertising Strategy, Storytelling, Social Media Management, Brand Research, Video Editing, Marketing Strategy
Country: United States
click to apply
